TodayAvailabilityNote.title: Today product availability text
TodayAvailabilityNote.description: Today product availability text (ex.: 'today'). Please, enter only one value per language.

TransferAvailabilityNote.title: Transfer product availability text
TransferAvailabilityNote.description: Transfer product availability text (ex.: '2-3 days'). Please, enter only one value per language.

GlobalTransferAvailabilityNote.title: Global transfer product availability text
GlobalTransferAvailabilityNote.description: Global transfer product availability text (ex.: '1 week'). Please, enter only one value per language.
